TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontUnit extends System.ValueType
.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FontUnit extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示字体的大小。

span.span: Represents the size of a font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象一次更改多个控件的样式属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties for multiple controls at one time. 每次 `Style` 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the `Style` property values changes, each control must call its method. 此示例中包含的所有控件都不支持所演示的所有属性。Not all the controls included in this example support all the properties that are demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数识别 `value` 下表中显示的字符串，以创建类的新实例 。The constructor recognizes the strings for `value` that are shown in the following table to create a new instance of the class. |字符串值String value|| |------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |`xx-small`, `xxsmall``xx-small`, `xxsmall`|| |`x-small`, `xsmall``x-small`, `xsmall`|| |`x-large`, `xlarge``x-large`, `xlarge`|| |`xx-large`, `xxlarge``xx-large`, `xxlarge`|| |`small`|| |`smaller`|| |`large`|| |`larger`|| |`medium`|| 在所有情况下， 属性都具有值 。In all cases, the property has the value . 字符串比较不区分大小写。The string comparison is case insensitive. 对于的所有其他值 `value` ，通过将视为 `value` 字体大小并将属性设置为，创建类的新实例 。For all other values of `value`, a new instance of the class is created by treating `value` as a font size and setting the property to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 字段表示 属性设置为的对象 `FontSize.Large` 。Use the field to represent a object with the property set to `FontSize.Large`. 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本中，从 属性设置为此字段的控件呈现的 HTML 输出为 `style= "font-size:Large"` 。In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Large"`. 在早于 Internet Explorer 4.0 的浏览器中，HTML 呈现的输出为 `` 。In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is ``.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 字段表示 属性设置为的对象 `FontSize.Small` 。Use the field to represent a object with the property set to `FontSize.Small`. 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本中，从 属性设置为此字段的控件呈现的 HTML 输出为 `style= "font-size:Small"` 。In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Small"`. 在早于 Internet Explorer 4.0 的浏览器中，HTML 呈现的输出为 `` 。In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is ``.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit Smaller
Public Shared ReadOnly Smaller As FontUnit

summary.span: 表示一个 属性设置为 的 对象。

span.span: Represents a object with the property set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 字段表示 属性设置为的对象 `FontSize.Smaller` 。Use the field to represent a object with the property set to `FontSize.Smaller`. 在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本中，从 属性设置为此字段的控件呈现的 HTML 输出为 `style= "font-size:Smaller"` 。In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the property set to this field is `style= "font-size:Smaller"`. 在早于 Internet Explorer 4.0 的浏览器中，不会创建任何 HTML 呈现的输出。In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, no HTML rendered output is created. > [!NOTE] > 某些浏览器不能识别 字体大小。Some browsers do not recognize the font size. 查看浏览器的兼容性。Check your browser for compatibility.

summary.span: 将 对象转换为字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the object to a string representation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 将 对象转换为默认的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the object to the default string representation.

returns.span: 对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: The string representation of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法检索的字符串表示形式 。Use the method to retrieve the string representation of the . 如果将 属性设置为 `FontSize.AsUnit` ，则返回的字符串是 属性中包含的等效字符串 。If the property is set to `FontSize.AsUnit`, the returned string is the string equivalent of the contained in the property. 如果将 属性设置为任何其他 值，则返回的字符串为与该值等效的字符串 。If the property is set to any other value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the value.

summary.span: 使用指定的 将 对象转换为字符串表示形式。

span.span: Converts the object to a string representation, using the specified .

returns.span: 指定区域性中的 对象的字符串表示形式。

span.span: The string representation of the object in the specified culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法检索指定区域性中的的字符串表示形式 。Use the method to retrieve the string representation of the in the specified culture. 如果将 属性设置为 `FontSize.AsUnit` ，则返回的字符串是 属性中包含的等效字符串 。If the property is set to `FontSize.AsUnit`, the returned string is the string equivalent of the contained in the property. 如果将 属性设置为任何其他 值，则返回的字符串为与该值等效的字符串 。If the property is set to any other value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString(class System.IFormatProvider formatProvider) cil managed
Public Function ToString (formatProvider As IFormatProvider) As String

param.name: formatProvider
param.span: 一个 ，提供区域性特定格式设置信息，此信息用于 属性设置为 值的情况；否则，它会被忽略。

span.span: An that supplies culture-specific formatting information, which is used if the property is set to the value; otherwise, it is ignored.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式提供程序将一个 对象转换为字符串等效项。

span.span: Converts a object to a string equivalent using the specified format provider.

returns.span: 表示此 的字符串，其中任何数字单位值都具有 指定的格式。

span.span: A string that represents this , with any numeric unit value in the format specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法检索对象的字符串表示形式，该 对象对字符串中的任何数值使用特定于区域性的格式提供程序。Use the method to retrieve the string representation of the object using a culture-specific format provider for any numeric values that are in the string. 如果 将属性设置为 值，则返回的字符串是属性中包含的单元值的等效字符串 。If the property is set to the value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the unit value that is contained in the property. 使用指定的设置值的数字部分的格式 `formatProvider` 。The numeric portion of the value is formatted using the specified `formatProvider`. 换言之，当 属性设置为 值时，将使用 存储在属性中的 unit 对象上的方法生成返回的字符串表示形式 。In other words, when the property is set to the value, the returned string representation is generated using the method on the unit object that is stored in the property. 如果将 属性设置为任何其他 值，则返回的字符串为与该值等效的字符串 。If the property is set to any other value, the returned string is the string equivalent of the value.
